comments: Lowry (MIA) is firming up in Hayward's (CHA) path and absorbs the contact during the pick.
Bridges (CHA) is moving alongside Martin's (MIA) path when marginal body contact occurs as Martin drives toward the lane.
Martin (MIA) establishes his right foot as his pivot and slides it before starting his upward shooting motion.
Bridges (CHA) stops his forward momentum and absorbs the marginal body contact that occurs as Martin (MIA) leans forward toward him prior to the start of his upward shooting motion.
Hayward (CHA) is already in Martin's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Hayward (CHA) is moving toward Butler's (MIA) path with his left arm brought forward and marginal contact occurs with Butler's side/back after his gather.
Butler (MIA) establishes his left foot as his pivot foot and slides it before elevating for the shot attempt.
Robinson (MIA) and Miller (CHA) engage and disengage with one another as they move along the perimeter.
Martin (MIA) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt.
Hayward (CHA) brushes Butler's (MIA) left arm and marginal contact occurs after Butler already starts to lose control of the ball on his own during the drive.
Butler (MIA) does not bring part of his hand under the ball when he momentarily loses control of his dribble.
Hayward (CHA) and Butler (MIA) make incidental side-to-side contact with one another as they each pursue the loose ball.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) briefly has his arms around Washington's (CHA) upper half before correcting during the inbound.
Butler (MIA) is moving forward toward Rozier's (CHA) path as Rozier cuts back toward the sideline and marginal contact occurs when they come together during the inbound.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) extends his left leg into Rozier's (CHA) path and is not in a legal guarding position when body contact occurs during Rozier's drive.
Rozier (CHA) crosses the plane of the free throw line prior to the ball entering the imaginary cylinder above the rim.
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Martin (MIA).
Butler (MIA) commits a take foul on Rozier (CHA).
Washington (CHA) and Butler (MIA) engage and disengage with one another after the ball is released during the inbound.
Washington (CHA) cleanly blocks Butler's (MIA) layup attempt prior to incidental contact occurring.
Washington (CHA) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Heat.
Miller (CHA) brings his arms forward towards Butler (MIA) and marginal contact occurs as Butler receives the pass.
Bridges (CHA) attempts to commit a take foul on Butler (MIA) and the contact is marginal.
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA). Any contact thereafter is deemed immaterial.

Butler (MIA) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released. Butler would avoid Rozier's body if Rozier did not slightly extend his left leg outward to initiate further marginal contact after the release.
